test.name: TC1: Search Functionality with Search Icon

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Click Search Icon
kw.doc: This keyword clicks the search icon to show or hide the search bar.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Search Bar Should Be Visible
kw.doc: This keyword verifies that the search bar is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Search Icon
kw.doc: This keyword clicks the search icon to show or hide the search bar.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Search Bar Should Be Hidden
kw.doc: This keyword verifies that the search bar is hidden.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Click Search Icon
kw.doc: This keyword clicks the search icon to show or hide the search bar.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Type In Search Bar
kw.doc: This keyword types the given text into the search bar.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Devops' into text field 'xpath=//input[@type='text' and @name='s']'.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Sending key(s) ('ENTER',) to xpath=//input[@type='text' and @name='s'] element.
Pressing special key ENTER to element.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Avisto Logo
kw.doc: This keyword clicks on the Avisto logo and verifies that the homepage is opened. It checks that after clicking the logo, the browser navigates back to the homepage URL https://www.avisto-eastern.com/.

kw.name: Click Image
kw.doc: Clicks an image identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Home < Avisto Eastern Europe'.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Search Bar Should Be Hidden
kw.doc: This keyword verifies that the search bar is hidden.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Click Search Icon
kw.doc: This keyword clicks the search icon to show or hide the search bar.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Type In Search Bar
kw.doc: This keyword types the given text into the search bar.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Case study' into text field 'xpath=//input[@type='text' and @name='s']'.

kw.name: Scroll Down
kw.doc: This keyword scrolls down the page.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollBy(0, 1000) Without any arguments.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Scroll Up
kw.doc: This keyword scrolls up the page.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollBy(0, -1000) Without any arguments.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Search Bar Should Be Hidden
kw.doc: This keyword verifies that the search bar is hidden.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Click Search Icon
kw.doc: This keyword clicks the search icon to show or hide the search bar.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Search Bar Should Be Visible
kw.doc: This keyword verifies that the search bar is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Search Bar Should Contain Text
kw.doc: This keyword checks that the search bar contains the given text.

kw.name: Get Value
kw.doc: Returns the value attribute of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: The value in the input field is: ${text_from_search}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: The value in the input field is: Case study

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Sending key(s) ('ENTER',) to xpath=//input[@type='text' and @name='s'] element.
Pressing special key ENTER to element.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.arg: xpath=//a[normalize-space()='TI AM6548 SITARA BASED BOARD BSP IMPLEMENTATION']
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//a[normalize-space()='TI AM6548 SITARA BASED BOARD BSP IMPLEMENTATION']' is displayed.

kw.name: Click Avisto Logo
kw.doc: This keyword clicks on the Avisto logo and verifies that the homepage is opened. It checks that after clicking the logo, the browser navigates back to the homepage URL https://www.avisto-eastern.com/.

kw.name: Click Image
kw.doc: Clicks an image identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Home < Avisto Eastern Europe'.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Click Search Icon
kw.doc: This keyword clicks the search icon to show or hide the search bar.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Type In Search Bar
kw.doc: This keyword types the given text into the search bar.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'announcement' into text field 'xpath=//input[@type='text' and @name='s']'.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Sending key(s) ('ENTER',) to xpath=//input[@type='text' and @name='s'] element.
Pressing special key ENTER to element.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.arg: xpath=//a[normalize-space()='ADVANS Group Acquires Niri Intelligent Computing']
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//a[normalize-space()='ADVANS Group Acquires Niri Intelligent Computing']' is displayed.

kw.name: Click Avisto Logo
kw.doc: This keyword clicks on the Avisto logo and verifies that the homepage is opened. It checks that after clicking the logo, the browser navigates back to the homepage URL https://www.avisto-eastern.com/.

kw.name: Click Image
kw.doc: Clicks an image identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Home < Avisto Eastern Europe'.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: This test case verifies the behavior of the search functionality. It checks the following: 1. Clicking the search icon shows the search bar. 2. Clicking the search icon again hides the search bar. 3. Typing a search term ('Devops') shows relevant page. 4. Typing a search term ('Case study') and scrolling down. 5. Verifying no results for the search term 'announcement'.
